channel.title: Need to make server compatible with Rs-ps
channel.description:
So I can run my server and people have to download a client to play it. No body wants to do that because it is so much easier to just play on a webclient. So i decided to put it on rs-ps . org and I go to play it and nothing happens. I know I need to put something in the Server folder to make it compatible to work on the internet. THe problem is, I don't know what to add or where/how to add it. So if someone could please respond with a detailed place on where and what to put, or could you Teamview me, and show me so I don't mess it up to badly ;). Please respond because that is the final thing i need to let people play it.
EDIT: The base is 317 Project Insanity

item.title: Need to make server compatible with Rs-ps
item.dc:creator: @ibarageu ibarageu
item.description:
@ibarageu wrote:

So I can run my server and people have to download a client to play it. No body wants to do that because it is so much easier to just play on a webclient. So i decided to put it on rs-ps . org and I go to play it and nothing happens. I know I need to put something in the Server folder to make it compatible to work on the internet. THe problem is, I don’t know what to add or where/how to add it. So if someone could please respond with a detailed place on where and what to put, or could you Teamview me, and show me so I don’t mess it up to badly ;). Please respond because that is the final thing i need to let people play it.
